Class SalesforceOAuthPlugin

java.lang.Object
  Plugin
      com.salesforce.androidsdk.phonegap.SalesforceOAuthPlugin

public class SalesforceOAuthPlugin
extends Plugin

PhoneGap plugin for PhoneGap-based Force applications.

Method Detail

autoRefreshIfNeeded

public static void autoRefreshIfNeeded(WebView webView,
                                       SalesforceDroidGapActivity ctx)
If auto-refresh is enabled, this method will be called when the app resumes, and automatically refresh the user's OAuth credentials in the app, ensuring a valid session.

Parameters:
webView - The WebView running the application.
ctx - The main activity/context for the app.

execute

public PluginResult execute(java.lang.String actionStr,
                            JSONArray args,
                            java.lang.String callbackId)
Executes the plugin request and returns PluginResult.

Parameters:
actionStr - The action to execute.
args - JSONArray of arguments for the plugin.
callbackId - The callback ID used when calling back into JavaScript.
Returns:
A PluginResult object with a status and message.

authenticate

protected PluginResult authenticate(JSONArray args,
                                    java.lang.String callbackId)
                             throws JSONException
Native implementation for "authenticate" action

Parameters:
args - The arguments used for authentication.
callbackId - The callback ID used when calling back into Javascript.
Returns:
NO_RESULT since authentication is asynchronous.
Throws:
JSONException

getAuthCredentials

protected PluginResult getAuthCredentials(java.lang.String callbackId)
                                   throws JSONException
Native implementation for "getAuthCredentials" action.

Parameters:
callbackId - The callback ID used when calling back into Javascript.
Returns:
The plugin result (ok if authenticated, error otherwise).
Throws:
JSONException

logoutCurrentUser

protected PluginResult logoutCurrentUser()
Native implementation for "logout" action

Returns:
This should always return the ok plugin result.

Logout and reset static fields
